mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (comment_id, review_id, comment_content, member_email, comment_regdate) VALUES (comment_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{review_id}, #{comment_content}, #{member_email}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, m.member_nickname FROM comments c INNER JOIN member m ON c.member_email = m.member_email WHERE c.review_id = #{review_id} ORDER BY c.comment_id
